name: Prism Rush
description:
Prism Rush is a fast paced arena shooter about a mage that hungers for greater power. By slaying enemies the player adds points to their score, increasing their health and unlocking new abilities.

Recommended resolution: 1080 x 1920

Credits

Dominik Lussier-Marcotte - Game Design, Level Design, Digital Art, UI, VFX
Viktor Briceno - Game Design, Programming
Jason Guzzo - Game Design, Level Design, Programming
Benson Pharoah - Modeling, Programming
Adam Sadek - Modeling

Prism Rush is a prototype game that was made for a Dawson College class.
